input.sentences: a look back in time shows us how main street use to look with big department stores .
an old blacksmith shop was one of the main businesses at the turn of the century .
business was booming in downtown with little shops catering to your every need .
a nice local owned general store was a popular spot .
this is how they used to deliver milk to the local townspeople .
output.sentences: We looked at old photos of the city.
We remarked on their clothes and imagined their lives.
The city had changed so much.
I wish we could go back in time and experience it firsthand.
I wish life were simpler and we traveled slower.
